text: [Music]
hi I'm Tim and this is my pronunciation
Workshop here I'm going to show you how
English is really spoken it'll help you
become a better listener and a more
fluent speaker come on let's go inside
[Music]
today we're going to hear a disappearing
sound or rather we're not going to hear
it what is the negative form of can
can't right and what's the final sound
in the word
can't T right or is it how good are you
at maths can you answer this question
H tricky let's ask the people of London
oh sorry I can't do it I can't do it
sorry I can't do that sorry I can't do
that no I can't do that no sorry I can't
do that well that is very tricky indeed
I'll give you the answer in a minute but
first did you notice the T sound at the
end of the word can't
no I don't think I did either let's have
another listen oh sorry I can't do it I
can't do it sorry I can't do that sorry
I can't do that no I can't do that no
sorry I can't do
that in everyday speech when a t sound
comes in between two consonant sounds we
often don't pronounce it this is because
it makes the words flow together more
fluently it's more difficult to say
three con ANS together in a row when T
is in the middle your mouth has to do
too much work I can't do it is more
difficult to say than I can't do it when
a sound disappears in between two words
it's called illusion here are some other
examples I can't stand the rain it must
be time to
leave am I the first person here I don't
want it
so you've heard the examples and now
it's your turn are you ready to give it
a go listen and repeat I can't stand the
rain it must be time to
leave am I the first person
here I don't want it
how did you get
on great remember if you want to read
more about this topic please visit our
website bbclearningenglish.com
now are you still struggling with that
Math's question well let me put you out
of your misery here's the

answer right well that's all for this
